title: Where to buy bikes online before sales start surging again
body: Bike sales were booming last year once spring rolled around, and bike makers struggled with inventory shortages as people searched for something to do during the height of the coronavirus pandemic. (Graphic by Nicolette Accardi | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com)Warmer weather is now here, which means spending more time outdoors.If you’re not a fan of , hiking or running, one activity to consider to get moving is bike-riding.Bike sales were  once spring rolled around, and bike-makers  as people searched for something to do during the height of the coronavirus pandemic.Since spring has arrived, now may be a good time to invest in a bike before the buying surge begins again.Plenty of retailers sell basic bicycles and equipment —  right now — and you can also search higher-end inventory at bike-specific stores .Here is a roundup of where you can buy bikes right now, from mountain to road to exercise bikes — organized by price (high to low).(Photo courtesy of Sun & Ski Sports)Mountain bikes have treaded tires and multiple gears, making it easy to ride on different kinds of terrain.(Photo courtesy of Dick's Sporting Goods)If you’re more into taking a leisurely bike ride around the neighbor or as a mode of transportation, a road bike is most likely the best fit for you.(Photo courtesy of Dick's Sporting Goods)There are plenty of kid-size bikes available.(Photo courtesy of Bowflex)If you prefer indoor cycling, check out the options below.Powered by 1 of 6To understand how we may use the results of this poll, please read our  and .
